1.png.description: The TV is clearly visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target without any visible obstacles in the direct path.

2.png.action: go straight 1 meter — bad action - lost target
2.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving straight will help center the TV in the frame and bring it closer.
The TV is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will help center the TV in the frame and bring it closer.

3.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
3.png.description: The TV is not visible in the current image, so the target is considered lost.

4.png.action: go straight 1 meter — bad action - lost target
4.png.description: The TV is clearly visible on the left side of the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the TV and help center it in the frame.
The TV is clearly visible on the left side of the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the TV while keeping it in view.

5.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
5.png.description: The TV is not visible in the current image.

6.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will help center the TV in the frame and bring it closer.

7.png.description: The TV is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears very close with clear details. There are no obstacles blocking the view.
